subject: Respond for your loan approval
body:
Dear Home Owner

Are you still paying too much for your mortgage?. Your approval is waiting.

You can receive $258,000 for 
$595 per month.

Please respond A.S.A.P.
http://ilook.tw/nsg8






Elvia Simon
Your Home Loan


Why does the Air Force need expensive new bombers? Have the people we've been bombing over the years been complaining?	George Wallace
